test.name: UC1_AC1: As the Clerk, I should be able to insert a single record of working class hero into database via an API

kw.name: Create Session
kw.doc: Create Session: create a HTTP session to a server
kw.msg: Creating Session using : alias=session, url=http://localhost:8080, headers={}, cookies={}, auth=None, timeout=None, proxies=None, verify=False, debug=0

kw.name: Create Dictionary
kw.doc: Creates and returns a dictionary based on the given ``items``.

kw.name: POST On Session
kw.doc: Sends a POST request on a previously created HTTP Session.
kw.msg: POST Request : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/insert path_url=/calculator/insert headers={'User-Agent': 'python-requests/2.28.1', 'Accept-Encoding': 'gzip, deflate', 'Accept': '*/*', 'Connection': 'keep-alive', 'Content-Length': '105', 'Content-Type': 'application/json'} body=b'{"birthday": "11101985", "gender": "M", "name": "Sagar", "natid": "33333", "salary": "1000", "tax": "10"}'

POST Response : url=http://localhost:8080/calculator/insert status=202, reason= headers={'Content-Type': 'text/plain;charset=UTF-8', 'Content-Length': '7', 'Date': 'Sat, 05 Nov 2022 14:49:04 GMT'} body=Alright

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

kw.name: Should Be Equal As Strings
kw.doc: Fails if objects are unequal after converting them to strings.

kw.name: Validate Json
kw.doc: Validates the sample JSON against the given schema.

kw.name: Validate Tax Relief
kw.doc: This functions Validates AC: US4_AC3,US4_AC4,US4_AC5 ie: AC4 - Rounding to 2 decimals AC5 - Computed Tax is in between 0.00 and 50.00 then Final Tax relief amount = 50.00

kw.name: Set Global Variable
kw.doc: Makes a variable available globally in all tests and suites.

kw.name: Log To Console
kw.doc: Logs the given message to the console.

test.name: UC5: As the Governor, I should be able to see a button on the screen so that I can dispense tax relief for my working class heroes

kw.name: Open Browser
kw.doc: Opens a new browser instance to the optional ``url``.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Element Text Should Be
kw.doc: Verifies that element ``locator`` contains exact the text ``expected``.
kw.msg: Verifying element '<selenium.webdriver.remote.webelement.WebElement (session="59c93e837f0a094ad01276f2235b038d", element="7a9da90b-387e-4c7c-9ac9-c8b30b740d38")>' contains exact text 'Dispense Now'.

kw.name: Get CSS Property Value
kw.doc: Get the CSS property value of an Element.

kw.name: Get WebElement
kw.doc: Returns the first WebElement matching the given ``locator``.

kw.name: Call Method
kw.doc: Calls the named method of the given object with the provided arguments.

kw.name: Should Match
kw.doc: Fails if the given ``string`` does not match the given ``pattern``.

kw.name: Click Button
kw.doc: Clicks the button identified by ``locator``.

kw.name: Page Should Contain
kw.doc: Verifies that current page contains ``text``.

kw.name: Close All Browsers
kw.doc: Closes all open browsers and resets the browser cache.
